languages.text: Завидев вас, корабли сопровождения тут же бросаются в бой, а захваченный "Межзвездный" подает питание на варп-двигатели. Если вы не успеете прервать подготовку к прыжку, грузовое судно навсегда исчезнет за покровом Имматериума вместе со всеми перевозимыми богатствами.

traits.locale_text: Завидев вас, корабли сопровождения тут же бросаются в бой, а захваченный "Межзвездный" подает питание на варп-двигатели. Если Вольный Торговец не успеет прервать подготовку к прыжку, грузовое судно навсегда исчезнет за покровом Имматериума вместе со всеми перевозимыми богатствами.

languages.text: As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless you interrupt the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.
languages.original_text: Завидев вас, корабли сопровождения тут же бросаются в бой, а захваченный "Межзвездный" подает питание на варп-двигатели. Если вы не успеете прервать подготовку к прыжку, грузовое судно навсегда исчезнет за покровом Имматериума вместе со всеми перевозимыми богатствами.

traits.locale_text: As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless the Rogue Trader interrupts the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish behind the Immaterium's veil along with all the riches it's carrying.

As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless the Rogue Trader interrupts the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish behind the Immaterium's veil along with all the riches it's carrying.

As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless the Rogue Trader interrupts the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish behind the Immaterium's veil along with all the riches it's carrying.

As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless the Rogue Trader interrupts the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.

As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless the Rogue Trader interrupts the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.

As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless you interrupt the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.

languages.text: 一看到你，海盗的护卫舰就加入了战斗，而被占领的星际六分仪号立刻发动了亚空间引擎。除非你能打断这艘船的跃迁准备，否则这艘货船恐怕会带着它所有的财富，永远地消失在亚空间的面纱后面。
languages.original_text: As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless you interrupt the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.

traits.locale_text: 一看到你，海盗的护卫舰就加入了战斗，而被占领的星际六分仪号立刻发动了亚空间引擎。除非你能打断这艘船的跃迁准备，否则这艘货船恐怕会带着它所有的财富，永远地消失在亚空间的面纱后面。

languages.text: En cuanto te ven, las naves de escolta cargan al combate mientras el Sextante empieza a activar los motores de disformidad. A no ser que interrumpas los preparativos del salto, la nave se esfumará en el velo del Inmaterio junto con su valiosa carga.
languages.original_text: As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless you interrupt the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto te ven, las naves de escolta cargan al combate mientras el Sextante empieza a activar los motores de disformidad. A no ser que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente interrumpa los preparativos del salto, la nave se esfumará en el velo del Inmaterio junto con su valiosa carga.

languages.text: こちらを見るや否や、曳航船は一斉に戦闘に突入し、一方で捕らえられたセクスタントはワープエンジンをパワーアップさせる。あなたが発射準備を中断させない限り、貨物船は富とともに非物質世界のベールを越え、永遠に消え去るだろう。
languages.original_text: As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless you interrupt the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.

traits.locale_text: こちらを見るや否や、曳航船は一斉に戦闘に突入し、一方で捕らえられたセクスタントはワープエンジンをパワーアップさせる。ローグトレーダーが発射準備を中断させない限り、貨物船は富とともに非物質世界のベールを越え、永遠に消え去るだろう。

languages.text: Sobald sie dich sehen, greifen die Geleitschiffe sofort an, während die verschleppte Sternensextant ihre Warp-Triebwerke startet. Wenn du die Vorbereitungen für den Sprung nicht unterbrichst, wird das Frachtschiff für immer hinter dem Schleier des Immateriums verschwinden, und auch all die Reichtümer, die es mit sich führt.
languages.original_text: As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless you interrupt the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.

traits.locale_text: Sobald sie dich sehen, greifen die Geleitschiffe sofort an, während die verschleppte Sternensextant ihre Warp-Triebwerke startet. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Vorbereitungen für den Sprung nicht unterbricht, wird das Frachtschiff für immer hinter dem Schleier des Immateriums verschwinden, und auch all die Reichtümer, die es mit sich führt.

Sobald sie dich sehen, greifen die Geleitschiffe sofort an, während die verschleppte Sternensextant ihre Warp-Triebwerke startet. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} die Vorbereitungen für den Sprung nicht unterbricht, wird das Frachtschiff für immer hinter dem Schleier des Immateriums verschwinden, und auch all die Reichtümer, die es mit sich führt.

languages.text: Dès qu'ils vous aperçoivent, les vaisseaux d'escorte se ruent au combat, tandis que Sextant captif charge ses moteurs Warp. Si vous n'interrompez pas les préparatifs du saut, le transporteur disparaîtra à tout jamais à travers le voile de l'Immaterium, avec toutes les richesses qu'il contient.
languages.original_text: As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless you interrupt the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.

traits.locale_text: Dès qu'ils vous aperçoivent, les vaisseaux d'escorte se ruent au combat, tandis que Sextant captif charge ses moteurs du Warp. Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} n'interrompt pas les préparatifs du saut, le transporteur disparaîtra à tout jamais à travers le voile de l'Immaterium, de même que toutes les richesses qu'il contient.

languages.text: Refakatçi gemiler, gemini görür görmez çatışmaya giriyor. Bu sırada esir durumdaki Yıldız Yayı, öteboyut motorlarını çalıştırıyor. Sıçrama hazırlıklarını durdurmazsan yük gemisi, taşıdığı tüm zenginliklerle birlikte Tindiyar örtüsünün ardında sonsuza dek kaybolacak.
languages.original_text: As soon as they see you, the escort ships charge into battle at once, while the captive Sextant powers up its warp engines. Unless you interrupt the preparation for the jump, the cargo ship will forever vanish beyond the veil of the Immaterium, along with all the riches it is carrying.
